prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Book language is designed to be easily readable and writable by both humans and machines, using a .book.md or .book file extension with UTF-8 encoding. It is structured into sections, with each section starting with a heading.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
